attributes.action: order an inquiry into alleged CIA flights violating British soverignty and laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allegations have surfaced that the United States security service, the CIA, violated British soverignty by using British airports 73 times since 2001 for rendition flights.
As the UK is a seperate entity to America, these allegations warrant a full investigation to demonstrate that Britain does not tolerate having its soverignty violated in this way, especially as an aid to torture.
